title: Classic challah
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons honey', '300ml warm water', '2 1/4 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '150ml olive oil', '2 eggs', '625g plain flour, plus more if needed', '4 tablespoons milk', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 egg white', '1 tablespoon caster sugar']
